description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ) remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-26232), it is essential to apply the relevant updates as referenced in the KB articles listed below:

1. Review the build numbers associated with your Windows version:
   - [10.0.19045.4291]
   - [10.0.19044.4291]
   - [10.0.22631.3447]
   - [10.0.22000.2899]
   - [10.0.22621.3447]
   - [10.0.10240.20596]

2. Download and apply the updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog corresponding to the listed KB articles:
   - KB-5036925
   - KB-5036909
   - KB-5036899
   - KB-5036896
   - KB-5036894
   - KB-5036893
   - KB-5036892

**Details**:
- These updates address access-related vulnerabilities in MSMQ, which could allow for remote code execution.
- Always ensure to back up your system before applying updates to prevent any data loss.
- For more information, visit [Microsoft's update guide](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-26232).
